title: Game is pay to play
text: This game is aggravating, as sometimes you get stuck on the same level for weeks at a time.  If you pay them, you can get more moves or power ups to help with the levels, but if you don't want to pay the money, you are stuck there indefinitely.

title: No way to turn off hints
text: The hints in this game are overbearing and obnoxious, and half the time are not the best move. No option to turn them off is gonna turn me off the game. Super annoying.

title: Sugar drops
text: I miss the sugar drops that usually appear in level 20 but I have not seen them will they be coming back?

title: Please stop with all the pop ups between levels!
text: There are between 6 and 12 steps to get to the next game after finishing one.  Who cares about gold bars, boxes, secret keys, etc?  It adds nothing to an otherwise perfectly enjoyable game.  I’ve played these for years but rarely for very long in a stretch because I get too frustrated with having to go through so many steps for nothing.

title: Hate the Tournaments
text: Another update and once again I have lost the ability to see my friend’s progress, and am instead in one of those tournaments with random strangers.  If you want to offer the tournaments, please give players the options.   We have a standing coffee date and the “loser” of the week buys the coffee.  Now none of us can see each other.  Why always mess with a good thing????

title: Bad Move With Timed Boosters 😡
text:
I’ve been playing this game for years. I used to buy boosters and save them for when I needed them. I also could win boosters and save them. Then you introduced the timed boosters. 😡
I then realized you only wanted my money and didn’t care if I enjoyed the game. 
So, when my saved boosters run out, I’m deleting the game. 
NO MORE OF MY SWEET MONEY 💰

title: Great game but annoying
text: I love the game but I find it extremely annoying when I lose and try to quit so I can retry it because I don’t have gold and I’m not going to spend actual money on a game to get it or lives and it says “but you only have ___ more to go”. It’s really annoying, like if I click the little x to quit I WANT to quit don’t keep asking me if I’m sure 🙄

title: Addicting, but..
text: I love this game but I am getting so frustrated. I have spent money to pass levels because I get annoyed that I’m stuck on them for days and days. Twice in two days I have spent money to help me pass a level. I beat the level and move on. But when I exit my app, it takes me back 1-3 levels and I have to replay! What a waste of my money!!!! 😡😡😡

title: Constant Connection Error
text: I’ve played candy crush for years...now I receive a connection error.  I cannot connect to my King account or my Facebook account.  Please fix this error.

title: Candy Crush
text: This is one of the most exciting games I have ever played. It got me so hooked up and I can’t even get to complete my chores.

title: Can’t disable hints
text: I used to play this game a couple years ago. I wanted to start playing again, so I downloaded the app and signed in to my old account. I deleted it 20 minutes later. I played for 5 minutes. The other 15 minutes were spent trying to find a way to disable hints. At the time of this review, the only feature that can be disabled is the “fantastic five” feature. I’m disappointed and a little confused. What’s the point of a strategy game when you’re being told where all the moves are? Where’s the strategy in that?

title: Only game I play!
text: I am A Long Time Player of candy crush. Almost to level 6,000. I get through the levels to fast. I have to wait for updates for new levels. The updates for the game says that it is updated every week. Been waiting 3 days for new levels. I guess I am impatient and need to get my CC fix. Please add more levels sooner.

title: Not inclusive for the blind community
text: We cannot play this game with out full accessibility support and the app. We cannot see the screen, that is why we are asking for a accessibility patch built into the app in the next update please. We need voice guidance too play the games. Try playing the games with a blind fold on, the original game and the modified one and see witch one you would win? I wish all developers would walk a mile in our shoes to see what we go through every day!!!!!

title: Candy crush level 2630
text: I have found Candy Crush Level 2630 to be impossible because the cherries are not dropping out the hole. They constantly get stuck next to the chocolate spawner when they fall through. So how am I supposed to win Candy Crush Level 2630?
